Text:
Seriously? Who needs this outrageous FLAC quality? I can't even tell the difference between 192kbps and 320kbps MP3s.
Thankful for this OST none the less. Thanks man
Will find better quality I miss

Soundtracks generally deserve FLAC, but I think 320k is fine.
 Thanks for the upload!
